sentences.en: Decentralized stabilization controller of region for the systems is designed.
sentences.cn: 给出了该系统的区域的分散镇定控制器的设计.

sentences.en: Fluoride and strontium has special affinity and influence on bone stabilization.
sentences.cn: 氟、锶骨有特殊的亲和力,对骨代谢有特殊的影响.

sentences.en: Improved image stabilization when shooting at slow shutter speeds.
sentences.cn: 改善了图像稳定拍摄时,在慢快门速度.

sentences.en: It is possible to overstate the benefits of stabilization.
sentences.cn: 稳定性带来的好处有可能被夸大.

sentences.en: Monorail vehicles and ships use gyro verticals for stabilization.
sentences.cn: 独轨车辆及船舶上使用陀螺垂直器作为稳定之用.

sentences.en: Most applications involve simultaneous stabilization on three orthogonal axes.
sentences.cn: 大多数应用要求在三个相互垂直的轴上同时进得稳定.

sentences.en: On this point, RUP offers extensive guidance by showing you the prioritization technique of use cases and architecture stabilization.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上，RUP 通过展示用例和架构稳定性的优先化技术来提供广泛的指导。

sentences.en: Our goal must be the stabilization and normalization of life in Gaza.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标必须是使加沙人民能过上稳定、正常的生活。

sentences.en: The H 10 uses the same stabilization system as its predecessor.
sentences.cn: 有关的H10使用相同的稳定系统,作为它的前身.

sentences.en: The improved process will decrease energy consumption of the stabilization system.
sentences.cn: 改进后,降低了能耗,增加了效益.

sentences.en: The position of barycentre on plane directly impacts the stabilization and manipulation of plane.
sentences.cn: 飞机重心位置直接影响飞机的稳定和操纵特性。

sentences.en: The primary purpose of this book is to present a fundamental approach to stabilization of polymers.
sentences.cn: 本书的主要内容是介绍聚合物稳定化的基本方法.

sentences.en: The software modularity and stabilization of system is Expected.
sentences.cn: 系统软件设计力求稳定与模块化.

sentences.en: There has recently been some stabilization in world population.
sentences.cn: 最近世界人口有一些稳定了.

sentences.en: This area of study is central to the technology of inertial navigation and gyroscopic stabilization.
sentences.cn: 这个研究领域是惯性导航和陀螺稳定器技术的核心.

sentences.en: This reduced temperature dependence permits a simplified drive circuit and reduces the need for temperature stabilization.
sentences.cn: 与温度的关系变得不密切,也就使驱动电路简化并减少对温度稳定的要求.

sentences.en: With the higher olefins, stabilization of the energetic intermediates occurs more easily.
sentences.cn: 在较高的烯烃情况下, 高能的中间物稳定作用更易出现.

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 稳定剂；稳定器；安定装置
使…坚固；使…安定；装稳定器（等于stablize）
